actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the Joint Committee on Arrangements for Commemoration of the Bicentennial to use the U.S. Capitol Building for a Bicentennial reception for Members of Congress, other Government officials, the diplomatic corps, and members of the public.

summary.text: Authorizes the Joint Committee on Arrangements for Commemoration of the Bicentennial to use the Capitol Building for a Bicentennial reception to be held September 15. Authorizes the expenditure of $15,000 from the contingent fund of the Senate by the Joint Committee for such purpose.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the Joint Committee on Arrangements for Commemoration of the Bicentennial to use the U.S. Capitol Building for a Bicentennial reception for Members of Congress, other Government officials, the diplomatic corps, and members of the public.
